title: Role of the Primary Nurse — Leadership & Collaboration
description: Understand the primary nursing model, responsibilities, and discharge planning. Practice scenario-based learning and checklists.

screens.title: Primary Nursing Model
screens.body: Primary nurses manage entire episodes of care, ensuring continuity and quality for spinal rehabilitation patients.

screens.back: Primary nurses coordinate multidisciplinary teams and resources for safe, timely discharge.

screens.prompt: You are planning discharge for a patient with complex needs. What is your first step?

options.result: Correct — understanding goals is essential for planning.
Team meetings are important but should follow goal review.
Equipment orders should be based on assessed needs.

screens.prompt: How do you collaborate with other team members to achieve safe discharge?
